definitions.definition: ( rare outside entomology ) The mesial plane dividing the body into similar right and left halves.

main_definition: ( rare outside entomology ) The mesial plane dividing the body into similar right and left halves.

definitions.definition: A member of a group of subatomic particles having a mass intermediate between electrons and protons. (The most easily detected mesons fit this definition.)
An elementary particle that is composed of a quark and an antiquark , such as a kaon or pion . (Mesons composed of rarer quarks are much heavier.)

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A member of a group of subatomic particles having a mass intermediate between electrons and protons. (The most easily detected mesons fit this definition.)
secondary_definitions: ( now specifically , particle physics ) An elementary particle that is composed of a quark and an antiquark , such as a kaon or pion . (Mesons composed of rarer quarks are much heavier.)
